    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static Formats of(KeyFormat keyFormat,
                         FormatInfo valueFormat)
        Build formats for internal topics.

        Internal topics don't normally need any serde features set, as they use the format defaults. However, until ksqlDB supports wrapped single keys, any internal topic with a key format that supports both wrapping and unwrapping needs to have an explicit SerdeFeature.UNWRAP_SINGLES set to ensure backwards compatibility is easily achievable once wrapped keys are supported.

        Note: The unwrap feature should only be set when there is only a single key column. As ksql does not yet support multiple key columns, the only time there is no a single key column is when there is no key column, i.e. key-less streams. Internal topics, i.e. changelog and repartition topics, are never key-less. Hence this method can safely set the unwrap feature without checking the schema.

        The code that sets the option can be removed once wrapped keys are supported. Issue 6296 tracks the removal.

        Parameters:
        keyFormat - key format.
        valueFormat - value format.
        Returns:
        Formats instance.
        See Also:
        Issue 6296, SerdeFeaturesFactory.buildInternal(io.confluent.ksql.serde.Format)
